5d55f9a3-4c26-44ab-839b-376f2d4313ab.name: Specialized
5d55f9a3-4c26-44ab-839b-376f2d4313ab.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

c9079aed-437c-428a-a3f1-ba540067277c.name: Sympathy
c9079aed-437c-428a-a3f1-ba540067277c.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

d79f968e-f7af-4100-bbeb-a61dea2db849.name: Sympathy
d79f968e-f7af-4100-bbeb-a61dea2db849.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

646c7453-d513-4b51-b498-97861a9eaf45.name: Sympathy
646c7453-d513-4b51-b498-97861a9eaf45.notes: Death of one party kills the other

63311626-8fd4-42be-a0a0-7209c4a0723c.name: Sympathy
63311626-8fd4-42be-a0a0-7209c4a0723c.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

13eb3f78-1158-4968-b67a-f8166f286758.name: Oxygen Storage
13eb3f78-1158-4968-b67a-f8166f286758.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

af734564-53b7-47ba-a8ee-95472d6bcece.name: Oxygen Storage
af734564-53b7-47ba-a8ee-95472d6bcece.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

18b0ee14-fc5a-45a8-aaf5-38b18126a685.name: Oxygen Storage
18b0ee14-fc5a-45a8-aaf5-38b18126a685.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

8ada0e9b-b4b4-4527-a380-d699305cc6ec.name: Oxygen Storage
8ada0e9b-b4b4-4527-a380-d699305cc6ec.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

a77c37a9-19b9-4c1e-8f46-f31e5e753763.name: Oxygen Storage
a77c37a9-19b9-4c1e-8f46-f31e5e753763.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

4c3318a6-a857-458e-b81c-2a20c9b346b6.name: Diffuse
4c3318a6-a857-458e-b81c-2a20c9b346b6.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

eeebeec5-ffb5-486e-9b9c-6966c6fcd09c.name: Homogenous
eeebeec5-ffb5-486e-9b9c-6966c6fcd09c.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

a8ae6cce-1ef4-464b-b875-8ec9daabb3a5.name: No Blood
a8ae6cce-1ef4-464b-b875-8ec9daabb3a5.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

8243ee73-563d-4c71-acc9-f76242f40fb0.name: No Brain
8243ee73-563d-4c71-acc9-f76242f40fb0.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

01fbda82-3232-43d5-8557-593a487907c2.name: No Eyes
01fbda82-3232-43d5-8557-593a487907c2.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

6044d364-7686-45f5-ad4d-97430f804c2d.name: No Head
6044d364-7686-45f5-ad4d-97430f804c2d.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

6d14f83a-0948-4141-a6e5-5ce06c89e641.name: No Neck
6d14f83a-0948-4141-a6e5-5ce06c89e641.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

178b2081-8215-43c3-9fa1-8070ecd17c8d.name: No Vitals
178b2081-8215-43c3-9fa1-8070ecd17c8d.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

62b5576a-56e9-42bf-a02d-e25cf980bf4d.name: Unliving
62b5576a-56e9-42bf-a02d-e25cf980bf4d.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

e9dcd122-9ea1-4313-93ef-da7ba76772f1.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

85f064dd-23da-4035-8a06-b6a1a9dc8021.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

afc56422-546c-4ab5-83fc-0da76a875da0.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
